thread.title: Earth First! new age hippies wail for dead trees...

post.author: pbmax
post.body:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ElJFYwRtrH4

can this be real?

post.author: Hemebond
post.body: Definitely real. Yet another group of religious nut-jobs.

post.author: evilartist
post.body: Thanks, pbmax. That video made my day.

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body:
Hemebond wrote:
Definitely real. Yet another group of religious nut-jobs.


what religion would that be?

post.author: Brain Trepaning
post.body: ChrisTREEanity.

post.author: Hemebond
post.body: No, these are druids. Neo-pagan.

post.author: Ivan_the_B
post.body:
Brain Trepaning wrote:
ChrisTREEanity.


Hahaha great!

post.author: BNA!
post.body: Hey, the're just having a TREEsome!

post.author: pbmax
post.body: http://www.foxnews.com/story/0,2933,419643,00.html

post.author: =NoMercy=
post.body: These people need to realize that they would not have a house if trees were never taken down.........

post.author: rich_is_bored
post.body:
I realize everyone is having fun here and I hate to piss in your cereal but there are lots of equally silly ideologies out there. The only difference is that this group isn't well organized and doesn't have millions of members.

But hey, don't mind me. Let's keep pointing and laughing at the stupid people.

post.author: ajm113
post.body:
'Tree Farts', lol

And I called Barns & Nobels, Trees In Harm instead.

I wonder if they are men cry walker groups, now.

post.author: pbmax
post.body: do they have to mourn and lament like this every time they wipe their butts with toilet paper?

post.author: BNA!
post.body:
rich_is_bored wrote:
I realize everyone is having fun here and I hate to piss in your cereal but there are lots of equally silly ideologies out there. The only difference is that this group isn't well organized and doesn't have millions of members.

But hey, don't mind me. Let's keep pointing and laughing at the stupid people.


Well, you know, other groups would invade a country or crash a plane into a building if they were getting caught on youtube. That's probably the difference - a minority can only rule over the majority if they allow them to do so.
